quotes.0: "A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went."
quotes.1: "If you don't find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die."
quotes.2: "Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver."
quotes.3: "The lack of money is the root of all evil."
quotes.4: "Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant."
quotes.5: "A penny saved is a penny earned."
quotes.6: "It's not your salary that makes you rich, it's your spending habits."
quotes.7: "The more you learn, the more you earn."
quotes.8: "Every time you borrow money, you're robbing your future self."
quotes.10: "The only way to get ahead is to find errors in conventional wisdom."
